# How to Use Your Personal Workspace on Appdome

Last updated May 2, 2024 by Appdome

This Knowledge Base article describes the benefits and capabilities of using Personal Workspaces on Appdome to hold any Android and iOS mobile app.

We hope you find this knowledge base useful and enjoy using Appdome!

## About Using Personal Workspaces on Appdome

The user account is a critical part of your personal workspace on the [Appdome platform.](/how-to/mobile-app-security/no-code-mobile-app-security/what-is-the-appdome-platform/) It enables you to [upload and store an unlimited number of mobile app binaries](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/begin-no-code-mobile-app-security-project) associated with your account. This allows you to keep track of and save multiple mobile integration projects and return to your work app-by-app as you see fit.  
We remember exactly where you left off and preserve the app in the state that you left it.

By storing and organizing all of your mobile app binaries in a single library, you can easily enable your Appdome Fusion Sets configured by [Appdome-DEV](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/app-sec-release-automation/use-appdome-dev-secure-mobile-apps-at-scalte/) on any one of your mobile apps.

Your account is positioned to the left of the Appdome platform:

![Personal Workspace](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Personal-Workspace.png)

### How Do I Learn More?

Check out [Appdome’s platform](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/dev-sec-tools/how-appdome-works/how-appdome-no-code-platform-works/)or [request a demo](https://www.appdome.com/request-a-demo/) at any time.

If you have any questions, please send them our way at [support.appdome.com](http://support.appdome.com/) or via the chat window on the Appdome platform.

### Thank you!

Thanks for visiting [**Appdome**](https://www.appdome.com/ "https://www.appdome.com/")! Our mission is to secure every app on the planet by making mobile app security easy. We hope we’re living up to the mission with your project. If you don’t already have an account, you can [sign up for free](https://fusion.appdome.com/ "https://fusion.appdome.com/").
